body.name: Macally Ultra-Slim USB Wired Computer Keyboard - Works Great as Both a Windows or Wired Mac Keyboard - Compatible Full Size Apple Keyboard with Numeric Keypad for Mac Mini, iMac, MacBook - Space Gray
features: ULTIMATE WIRED KEYBOARD: Enhance your workplace with both style and increased productivity. This mac keyboard has a height less than a penny and will look great on any workstation.

BROAD COMPATIBILITY: If your laptop or computer has a USB port, you are ready to go! Works with both Mac OSX and Windows PC operating systems so it will be a perfect macbook air keyboard or keyboard for PC.

SHORTCUT KEYS & TEN-KEY NUMERIC KEYPAD: With 20 Apple shortcut keys it is the perfect mac keyboard wired alternative. Also, multimedia shortcuts for Windows PC allow you to have full control of your typing experience.
PLUG AND PLAY (NO DRIVERS REQUIRED): No need to continually change or recharge batteries with the imac keyboard. Enjoy a reliable & latency free typing experience.
OUR MISSION: We aim to provide products that are easy to use and effective. Your satisfaction is valued tremendously, therefore our slim keyboard is backed by a 1 year and LIFETIME SUPPORT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built keyboard with nice key feel and useful function keys
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard looks and feels good. The keys have a fairly short travel but I like the action very much. They have just the right amount of resistance for me.The keyboard is made of aluminum and is very nicely finished. The icing on the cake is useful function keys. There are keys that increase or decrease font size of web pages, keys that bring up the screen capture function, keys that increase or decrease monitor brightness, as well as the usual function keys that increase or decrease volume, etc.I also like the fact that it is a wired keyboard that plugs into a standard USB (type A) socket. I've had intermittency problems with wireless keyboards in the past, plus I'd rather not have to periodically charge my keyboard.I think that for the money this would be a hard keyboard to beat. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No problems whatsoever
reviews.reviewText: I have not had any problems with my Macally keyboard as few I have read. It is soft to the touch, larger sized keypads allowing me to type fast without slipping into the next key. No keys are sticking, and the typing is fluid. Interestingly, the two keys F and J have a slight edge to enable one to center their fingers quickly without looking, in the event you get off center. I'm very happy with this purchase. This and my matching Macally mouse arrived in less than three days. Priced very well on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tiny command and ridiculously large Fn keys
reviews.reviewText: Compared to the Apple keyboard, this one has added Fn keys to the left and right of the space bar row, resulting in a cramped control-option-command layout. It also features an absurdly large Fn key on the right (it's nearly the size of the return key). The keys themselves also have a textured finish and feel subjectively "harder" (surface hardness, not key press force) than the Apple keyboard. The function-lock and caps-lock indicators are bright and easily visible, as is the always-on power indicator. They would probably be visible outdoors at noon on a sunny day.That said, the movement feel is excellent, and very similar to Apple's keyboard. Other than the Fn keys, it's a fine alternative to a genuine Apple keyboard. They do offer other layouts that don't feature as many Fn keys, but all seem to have an extra special-use key on the right side of the space bar, and the other layouts feature different layouts/groupings of the function keys (F1-F16). There isn't a model that exactly duplicates Apple's layout, but I suspect there would be trademark/design issues involved in that.If you like Apple's keyboards, but don't want to pay their prices, I can't imagine you'd find a better alternative than this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice design, good quality.
reviews.reviewText: Great keyboard, I wish i could get used to location of control key bc I am using PC, not Mac. I cannot figure out if there is a way to convert Fn key to control key. Otherwise, great keyboard and great price. Nice flat profile and clean look with quiet typing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent light touch and well-built
reviews.reviewText: Even though I'm a Mac guy I use this on my windows computer, very nice light touch, great for fast typing. New users just have to get used to the different mapping of the keys (Windows vs Mac).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best keyboard i ever bought
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend this product. By the nature of my job i write a lot - and i mean it, a lot. About thirty pages a day. So keyboards are featured very prominently in my life and this is the best one that i have bought in the last twenty years. I like and i need low-key smooth keyboard and i am very happy that i finally have found one. I definitely will buy another one. The only inconvenience that i could imagine is MacOs settings. You have no PrntScr key. But for this it is possible to use software, such as Greenshot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Impossible to execute many keyboard shortcuts.
reviews.reviewText: If you're a Mac user who uses a number of keyboard shortcuts, this is not the keyboard for you. The first impossible task I discovered in seconds was my inability to move between tabs in a browser, for which one uses command/option and the arrow keys. However, the brilliant designers at Macally interrupted the flow by adding a giant "function" key to the right of the control key and my hand cannot reach the arrow keys. I don't need a function key that often but I guess they thought this would attract PC users. In order to accommodate the function key on the right they shrunk both the width of the spacebar and the size of the command, control and option keys. All of which are normally larger than the letter keys.In the couple of days I've been using this I've been interrupted countless times by having hit the wrong key, usually the function, when I want the control. The designers of this may as well have moved around the entire qwerty layout, for what this is worth.I'm not fond of the clickety clack I hear when typing. The real Mac keyboard is so much quieter. Albeit for $100 more. If I were to keep this I would need not only to grow larger hands but to reprogram my brain for the slightly moved and drastically altered command option and control keys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok Overall But Poor Placement of Ctrl Key
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a decent keyboard but the Ctrl key is not positioned in the lower left corner of the keyboard. This is probably the most used key aside from the space bar, why move it? now I have to do look at the keyboard everytime i need to copy, paste, select all, or do simple shorcuts - now I always get them wrong.
This keyboard is fantastic. The feel is so nice compared to much larger mechanical keyboards. Typing is swift and reliable thus far.
Je recommande l'achat de ce clavier.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty good replacement for Apple keyboard, works on Mac/Windows
reviews.reviewText: I bought this keyboard because I liked the layout/tactile feel of the Apple keyboard but I needed it to work for Windows (which this keyboard does). It worked as soon as I plugged it in (didn't have to install or download anything). I am using it on a Windows 10 desktop PC and it works pretty much flawlessly as far as I can tell. The "Windows" key is the "cmd" key, in case you were wondering, and the "Alt" key is the "option" key. The feel of the keys themselves is very nice to type with, with a very satisfying clicky feel that is very similar to the Apple keyboard. I bought this specifically for gaming (weird, but it's the style of keyboard I like for gaming). You can switch the F1-F12 etc keys to be able to be activated by the Function key, or not, depending on how you like it, simply by pressing Esc+Fn. I prefer the F1-F12 keys to be usable for gaming hot keys, so I was able to configure those keys the way I liked for gaming without the additional functions getting in the way. The build quality is pretty good, although maybe note QUITE as good as the Apple, but generally feels about the same. I give the product a 5/5 score. Perfect for what I needed, which is an Apple-style keyboard that works on Windows PC's, plug-and-play, with nice build quality, and good layout. Love it.
Muss ich leider zurückgeben, weil die Tastatur ein US-Layout hat. Das hatte ich in der Artikelbeschreibung übersehen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on February 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Purchased three keyboards. One "died" about three weeks in.Didn't get around reporting this two days after the return windows closed. No idea how to contact the vendor.
